messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Last reminder: Burner Sauna - Zum schwitzenden BÃ¤ren tonight at 6 at Studio DB, Wedding. Donâ€˜t forget to bring a funny â€Wichtel presentâ€œ if you want to take part in the big Wichtel Battle. Also our hots letâ€˜s you know: there will be festive food at a fair price: French cheese, oysters and bubbles.
And not to forget: Agro Yoga for all levels

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Yes, the rumours are true: in 2025 "Zum Brennenden BÃ¤ren" strikes  back!!!
After a three-year hibernation, ZZB (Burning Bear) is backâ€”and this time, itâ€™s double the fun! In 2025, weâ€™re thrilled to bring you two events: a winter burn from March 13â€“16 at the beloved Schloss Beesenstedt ğŸ° and a summer burn in mid-September at our sparkling new treasure ğŸ¤«

â€¼ï¸Yes, we found it: our new homeâ€¼ï¸
Our new location which we will reveal soon is the uncut rough diamond ğŸ’ weâ€™ve spent years searching for! Itâ€™s a place full of history. It has trizillion tons of space to realize our wildest dreams. By 2026 the new location will also be winter-ready, so we plan to make it our winter residency. However, we want to show how colourful, creative and wild we are. This is why we are doing our first event in September and we really need you to join forces.

This project only works if we collaborate like burners do and we are ready to invest a lot of love â¤ï¸ and resources into this project. Soon you will be able to pre-register and start working on whatever project you come up with.
Here are some teasers before the great reveal. An old prison in the basement?! Check! Rooms even more impressive than Beesenstedtâ€™s ballroom!? Check! A lake?! Check! Light-flooded rooms?! Check! We could go on like forever, or in short: weâ€˜re in love ğŸ¥°

Winter is too cold ğŸ¥¶ and September is too far?!
We got you covered. So, whatâ€™s a bear ğŸ» to do in the meantime? Hibernate for another winter? No way! After much thoughtful discussion and a democratic vote, the majority decided: weâ€™re heading back to Schloss Beesenstedt - our cozy but imperfect den under the big chandeliers.
Yes, the reasons we left havenâ€™t changed. Itâ€™s pricey, and not everyone loves the "plug-and-play" vibe. Weâ€™ve heard those voices, loud and clear. But no other venue gives us the creative freedom to make winter magic quite like Beesenstedt. Sure, we said: itâ€˜s over. We said: â€Ciao Cacaoâ€œ and â€last danceâ€œ, but we got an offer we could not refuse.

And be honest: who of you never had sex with their ex?
Letâ€™s work together to make this burn as inclusive as possible.
 Because whether youâ€™re a grizzly ğŸ» , a panda ğŸ¼ , or a teddy ğŸ§¸ , everyone deserves to experience the Burnâ€™s warmth and joy.  The details: Our membership lottery kicks off in the first weeks of January, so donâ€™t waitâ€”sign up now for your membership. The registration form will remain open until December 31st. One last hurrah in Beesenstedt, and thenâ€”onward to new horizons! The adventure is calling, and we canâ€™t wait to share it with all of you. #PawPower is back!
